722883f-b.title: Manhattan: Riverside Drive - 79th Street
722883f-b.text:
Riverside Park: A set of 3 views of the crossing at 79th Street,
as viewed from different angles. At the completion of the Wwst Side
Improvement Project these tracks of the New York Central Railroad will
disappear from view, being enclosed in an embankment, the roof of which
will provide an automotive causeway.
July 11, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

464740-a.title: The Riverdale, (southeast corner of Riverside Drive and 79th Street).
464740-a.folder: (southeast corner of Riverside Drive and 79th Street)., Manhattan, NY

722884f-c.title: Manhattan: Riverside Drive - 79th Street
722884f-c.text:
RIVERSIDE PARE:
Riverside Drive, west side, north from and including 79th Street;
reconstruction work is in progress on the west side of the ''Drive'.
The New York Central Railroad Tracks are in the foreground.
July 11, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(2 A 3)
Two additional views, northeast and southeast from the same
locality at the same time.
July 11, 1931.
. Sperr.  NO REPROUUCTIONS.

722881f-a.title: Manhattan: Riverside Drive - 79th Street
722881f-a.text:
(1)
Riverside Mark, north from 79th Street.
June 11, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
NEG ~ 3855
(2)
The same, showing a view further west beyond the New York
Central Railroad tracks which are shown in No. 1. Reconstruction
work is in progress here which will eventually cover the railroad
tracks and enable a park to be laid out.
June 11, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
